text: The Toyota MR2 and MR2 Spyder were sports cars made by Toyota. They were sold from 1984 until 2007. The MR2 is a mid-engine sports car, similar to cars by Ferrari and Porsche. MR2 is an acronym for midship, rear-wheel-drive, two- seater. Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles MR2
title: Toyota MR2
